Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Congress, Racine, Madison and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Congress, Racine, Madison, then resume their normal route on Ashland.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near the area of California due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near the area of California due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
